channel.title: osi-layer2 on Tils and bookmarks
channel.description: Recent content in osi-layer2 on Tils and bookmarks

item.title: IPv4 Link Local
item.description: To participate in wide-area IP networking, a host needs to be configured with IP addresses for its interfaces, either manually by the user or automatically from a source on the network such as a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server. Unfortunately, such address configuration information may not always be available. It is therefore beneficial for a host to be able to depend on a useful subset of IP networking functions even when no address configuration is available.
